alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:45AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Boyd, east central Greenup and southwestern Lawrence Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 845 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ironton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Ironton, Coal Grove, Lake Vesuvius, Flatwoods, Russell, Raceland, Worthington, Wurtland, Bellefonte, Aid, Westwood and Hanging Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
